efac:ChangeReason.efbc:ReasonDescription: Tender deadline has been extended from 12:00 on the 20/09/2024 to 17:00 on 24/09/2024

cac:PostalAddress.cbc:StreetName: Brunel Building, Heuston South Quarter, Dublin 8.

cac:SpecificTendererRequirement.cbc:Description: Please see the tender documents for full list of Exclusion Grounds

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Request for Tenders for the Provision of Childcare Legal Services to The Child and Family Agency (Tusla)
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Child and Family Agency (Tusla) (the “Contracting Authority”) invites tenders (“Tenders”) to this request for tenders (“RFT”) from economic operators (“Tenderers”) for the provision of the services as described in Appendix 1 to this RFT (the “Services”). In summary, the Services comprise: • Legal services relating to childcare (including education welfare services, early year services, domestic violence applications and criminal matters related to the minor) • Legal services relating to separated children seeking international protection • Legal services relating to adoption, birth information and tracing (ABIT) • Corporate and commercial legal services • Employment law services

efac:SelectionCriteria.cbc:Name: Please see the tender documents for full list of Selection Criteria
